body_html:
I think the spacing after commas is better now.

I have been thinking about the placeholder values for inputs_shape however I don't believe this is possible with this type of implementation. The reason being that you need to know the input shape to make the correct sized zero_state. I don't really see anyway to do this if the input shape is unknown. Does my reasoning seem correct on this?

body:
I think the spacing after commas is better now.

I have been thinking about the placeholder values for inputs_shape however I don't believe this is possible with this type of implementation. The reason being that you need to know the input shape to make the correct sized zero_state. I don't really see anyway to do this if the input shape is unknown. Does my reasoning seem correct on this?
